Promotion Content Reports Toolbar Website configuration website configuration Orders orders Account Users users Roles roles Administrators administrators Administrator SuperAdmin SuperOperator SuperManager ContentManager Financier Operator Customers Customer customers Data updated successfully Data added successfully Files uploaded successfully Photo uploaded successfully Links saved successfully No files selected for upload No URL of images specified Catalog Languages System Configuration general General Update update Editing editing Adding adding Caching caching Editing language selection Administrative interface language selection All languages versions Global website template website header Logo Display Hide The mode suggests that external categories are displayed as original ones The mode suggests that only internal categories are displayed The mode suggests that no categories are displayed Save Please wait while saving System Connected Filled in Enter a number in percent Help FAQ Information Contact Support (empty) Local help Please copy required code in field Text page settings Home page Display number of elements to be displayed in blocks Should be specified as a number.The recommended number of items to be displayed is from 4 to 8, news is 3 Item info Display of elements Catalog Upload To be displayed on the left side of website header. The recommended size: 300px width by 100px height. The recommended image format: png with transparent background, valid image formats: gif, jpg. Need set category mode Must set at minimum one category setting Column navigation Navigation menu display modes. Options: Display all menu items, Display menu items up to the second level, Hide the entire side menu Show all pages Only show topics Only show topics Hide left menu Text direction Layout of blocks on the website for languages that differ in the direction in which they are written. The default text direction is left to right. The right to left text direction is desirable for the following languages: Arabic, Persian, Yiddish, Urdu Left to right Right to left Display items Display of showcase items by category on the home page. Options: By carousel (in one line with scrolling arrows), By list (in several rows) By list By carousel Your code in head section of website template Your code in head section of website template Website title Header text News count Commented items Recommended sellers Popular brands Recommended items Popular items Recently viewed items Pristroy Taobao reviews Display Hide Item status Display Hide Taobao link Display Hide Item price Display Hide Local delivery Display Hide Your Browsing History Display Hide Specifics Display Hide Price range Display Display Hide Customer Review Display Display Hide Item weight Display Display Hide In stock Display Display Hide Sales volume for 30 days Display Display Hide Default tab Product details Photo and description Reviews Taobao reviews Product details Product details Catalog's category mode The selected category will be displayed in catalog and be available for search The mode suggests that external categories are displayed as original ones The mode suggests that external categories are displayed as original ones The mode suggests that only internal categories are displayed. Nothing but categories from the Categories section in the website's admin area will be displayed on the categories page and be available for search The mode suggests that no categories are displayed while the goods search rate is increased The subcategories of the current level will be displayed Default quantity of items to be displayed It is recommended that you select one of the following numerical values: 16, 64, 128. The quantity of items to be displayed on a page. If the number of goods exceeds the specified quantity they will be displayed on the next page and in pagination as well. Note: the more items are displayed on a page, the slower the page is uploaded. 20 20 40 100      A range of page numbers to display in pagination It is recommended that you set a numerical value from 1 to 5. On the catalog page below the list of goods pagination is provided to show the number of pages with the given item accessible for review 1 2 3 3 4 5 Contact us Display of contact information in the header beside the logo Display Display Hide Phone Phone We're open We're open Online support Add code received in on-line chat service you have selected to communicate with customers. Payment in cash Required to be enabled if "payment in cash" option is provided in addition to other payment methods Enable Disable Disable Hide middle name field Hide middle name field during user registration, in private office. Hide Show Hide Open payment page in new window Enable Disable Disable A payment system will open in a new browser window Mailbox for notifications Inbound address for order notifications, payment notifications and the customer's withdrawal requests Sender's mailbox The address to be specified in the field "From" in customer's emails (notifications) User's prefix It is recommended that you set the default value. Required for your login identification. It consists of 3 Latin alphabet letters. The default value is USR Order prefix It is recommended that you set the default value.Required for identification of your orders by a logistician.It consists of 3 Latin alphabet letters. The default value is ORD. Original package The option allows you to use or reject the original package of an item. Applicable to the entire list of goods while ordering Ignore Ignore Offer Order Insurance(%) Added to delivery fee Minimum order cost A numeric value (in currency selected). A customer will automatically be notified in case the total of order is less than the specified value. The maximum quantity of items in Favorites The quantity of items to be listed as Favorites. The recommended value is 1000. Note: the more items you put on the list the slower the page is loaded. The maximum quantity of items in the cart The quantity of items accessible for one order. The recommended value is 1000. Note: the more items you put on the list the slower the cart is loaded. Seller's discount Seller's discount Allow Forbid Allow Sale by auction Sale by auction Allow Forbid Allow Local delivery is not allowed Local delivery is not allowed Allow Forbid Allow Used items Used items Allow Forbid Allow Problem items The items which can offer problems while checking at customs are allowed for sale Allow Forbid Allow Temporary unavailable Taobao's temporary discontinued items are allowed for sale Allow Forbid Allow Restricted to be displayed Items restricted to be displayed in Restrictions section on the home page Allow Forbid Allow Hide restricted items on the website An item added to the Restrictions section won't be displayed Hide Display Hide Zip/Postal code required Making order is not allowed in case Zip/Postal code field is empty Optional Optional Required bank receipt Bank receipt Beneficiary's Name Beneficiary's VAT (10 or 12 digits) Beneficiary's Bank Account Number (20 digits) Beneficiary's Bank Name Russian Central Bank Identifier Code (8 or 9 digits) Beneficiary's correspondent account (20 digits) Payment name languages multilingualism Multilingualism Translations translations Showcase languages The Multilingual module allows you to create different language versions of the website. Here one can select a language in which goods on the home page will be displayed (showcase items). A language can be selected from the drop-down list on the right side of the page. Editing selected languages can be done on the left side of the page. Drag Delete Add language Key kg Text Language Action Translation is available No translation is available Not available In currency set for delivery Edit Close The default translation from "langs" folder in the website root is loaded. All languages All languages selected Search... Find All options Your own translations Missing translations Translations from the Box editing translation Editing translation Editing/creating key Key Cancel Cancellation Please wait while cancelling Date Sender Buyer-Recipient Picture Name TOTAL When deterioration of packaging, brand scotch and other signs of damage to the packaging, be sure to verify the contents of a given inventory! Order number Package number Delivery address Phone Quantity Price Inventory Debug information It is recommended that you enable this button together with "The website is temporary unavailable" option. Note that the speed test button will appear just in case you are authorized into the administration area. Besides, make sure that administrative and user's URLs do not contain "www" prefix. Display Hide Hide The website is temporary unavailable "Enabled" means setting the website offline for maintenance. Default: disabled Enable Disable Disable Redirection after authorization URL to redirect a customer after authorization Personal Area Home page Home page Simplified registration Lets to place orders without prior registration, with specifying user`s e-mail at the last stage of ordering Disable Enable Disable Enter captcha when log in into admin panel Additional bruteforce password protection for admin panel Enable Disable Disable Items comments Admin's email Inbound email address for error notifications Outbound email address for comments The email address to be specified in "from" field in emails (notifications)to customers Update server is unavailable Automatic system update Unknown Update Please wait while updating Current version Check new available versions the latest available update version change history Description of changes The version is compatible with your system The version is incompatible with your system. Updating is not advisable. Delivery Delivery Delivery internal external Internal External Rates rates Rates by countries rates by countries Names Delivery country Add Initial cost Step cost Editing delivery rate Creating delivery rate creating/editing delivery rate Country Availability Add delivery method Delivery methods Available delivery methods (advisable by your logistician) Delivery State/Province/Region State/Province/Region is selected where your logistician is located) Selection of State/Province/Region Added items from Merged with Selecting State/Province/Region Editing Creating delivery method creating/editing delivery method Name Description Order Currency Weight The minimum weight of a parcel The minimum allowable weight of a parcel The maximum weight of a parcel The maximum allowable weight of a parcel Weight-step The parcel weight is rounded up using the specified weight-step. For example, a parcel weight is 2 kg 678 g. A weight-step is 0,2 kg. It follows that the final parcel weight will be 2,8 kg.The delivery fee will be calculated for the parcel weighting 2,8 kg (not for 2,678 kg) Allow for the minimum delivery fee If a checkbox is checked the delivery fee will be calculated using the said minimum parcel weight whatever small parcel is. Allow for weight-step cost If a checkbox is checked a parcel weight is rounded up with the accuracy of weight-step. Round up to the nearest whole number If a checkbox is checked the weight will be rounded up to the whole kilograms. For example, parcel weight is 2 kg 678 g. The final parcel weight will be 3 kg. Applicable only if the weight-step is specified. Confirmation required Invalid/broken link Tracking number Tracking number to track a parcel in delivery service Status Parcel status (modified by a logistician) Delivery method Method of delivery to destination point(customer) Weight Parcel weight Fee Fee for delivering a parcel to destination point (customer) Parcel size Parcel size in cm Additional information Additional information on a parcel not specified in other fields Discount mode Discount mode Default mode for all users No discount offered Discounts only from cache Discounts only from cache and for items marked as Discount All discounts from cache and search requests Search methods Search methods in order Here you can select search methods for items (in categories inclusive) from the drop-down list located on the right side of the page. Editing search methods order and use can be done on the left side of the page Add to search methods used The last search method is impossible to delete Nothing to add We strongly recommend not using the word TAOBAO or any derivative word (for example, "All goods from TAOBAO)in search criteria (options). In the event of complaint from TAOBAO against it your website will be set offline All search methods selected The minimum parcel weight must not exceed the maximum one Currency chosen to calculate the fee for current delivery Index number of delivery in the list It is impossible to set the exchange rate for single currency Rate of exchange required Are you sure you want to delete the exchange rate selected?
